This [[fūinjutsu]] employs the use of formulae to bind a [[jinchūriki]] before extracting the [[tailed beast]] from within them. When extracted, the beast initially takes the form of pure chakra, also causing the host to go into a near Version 1-like state. After being extracted, the beast takes a corporeal form. Obito Uchiha waited until [[Kushina Uzumaki]]'s seal was weak enough to use this technique to extract [[Kurama]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 501, page 7</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Road to Ninja: Naruto the Movie]]'', Tobi — through [[Menma]] — can be seen extracting Kurama from Naruto with his [[Sharingan]] alone, without binding him with this fūinjutsu first.
